data.title: Mike Miller Player Profile, Denver Nuggets
data.meta_description: Get the latest news, stats and more about Mike Miller on RealGM.com
data.text: Jun 28, 2000 - The Orlando Magic selected Mike Miller in Round 1 with Pick 5 in the 2000 NBA Draft. Aug 11, 2000 - Mike Miller signed a multi-year contract with the Orlando Magic. Aug 23, 2002 - The Orlando Magic exercised their Team Option to extend the contract of Mike Miller. Feb 19, 2003 - Mike Miller was acquired by the Memphis Grizzlies, along with Ryan Humphrey, a 2003 1st round pick (SAC own), a 2004 2nd round pick (DEN own) and a TPE, from the Orlando Magic in exchange for Gordan Giricek, Drew Gooden and cash. Oct 3, 2003 - Mike Miller signed a rookie scale extension with the Memphis Grizzlies. Jun 26, 2008 - Mike Miller was acquired by the Minnesota Timberwolves, along with Brian Cardinal, Jason Collins and the draft rights to Kevin Love, from the Memphis Grizzlies in exchange for Greg Buckner, Marko Jaric, Antoine Walker and the draft rights to O.J. Mayo. Jun 24, 2009 - Mike Miller was acquired by the Washington Wizards, along with Randy Foye and a TPE, from the Minnesota Timberwolves in exchange for Oleksiy Pecherov, Darius Songaila, Etan Thomas and a 2009 1st round pick (WAS own). Jul 1, 2010 - Mike Miller, previously with the Washington Wizards, became a free agent. Jul 8, 2010 - The Washington Wizards renounced their free-agent exception rights to Mike Miller. Jul 15, 2010 - Mike Miller signed a multi-year contract with the Miami Heat. Jul 16, 2013 - The Miami Heat utilized the amnesty provision on the contract of Mike Miller. Jul 18, 2013 - Mike Miller, previously with the Miami Heat, became a free agent. Jul 29, 2013 - Mike Miller signed a contract with the Memphis Grizzlies. Jul 1, 2014 - Mike Miller, previously with the Memphis Grizzlies, became a free agent. Aug 5, 2014 - Mike Miller signed a multi-year contract with the Cleveland Cavaliers. Jun 29, 2015 - Mike Miller exercised a Player Option to extend his contract. Jul 27, 2015 - Mike Miller was acquired by the Portland Trail Blazers, along with Brendan Haywood, a More Favorable 2019 2nd round pick and a 2020 2nd round pick (CLE own), from the Cleveland Cavaliers in exchange for cash. Sep 28, 2015 - The Portland Trail Blazers placed the contract of Mike Miller on waivers. Sep 30, 2015 - Mike Miller, previously with the Portland Trail Blazers, became a free agent. Sep 30, 2015 - Mike Miller signed a contract with the Denver Nuggets. Jul 1, 2016 - Mike Miller, previously with the Denver Nuggets, became a free agent. Jul 20, 2016 - Mike Miller signed a multi-year contract with the Denver Nuggets. Jul 11, 2017 - The Denver Nuggets placed the contract of Mike Miller on waivers.
